p: According to preliminary phytochemical screening results of O. basilicum, N. sativa and L. angustifolia EOs, Table 2 shows the presence of phytochemical constituents in the selected botanical EOs with antioxidant activities such as glycosides in O. basilicum, N. sativa extracts, steroids, terpenoids, tannins and sterols compounds in O. basilicum, N. sativa and L. angustifolia EOs.
